titles.title: Marine Mammal Research and Response Act of 2019
Marine Mammal Research and Response Act of 2019
Marine Mammal Research and Response Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to reauthorize and modify the John H. Prescott Marine Mammal Rescue and Response Grant Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
